definition: imposingly fashionable and elegant, elegance by virtue of being fashionable, display proudly
details:
adjective
- imposingly fashionable and elegant
= example: imposingly fashionable and elegant
= synonyms: swanky
noun
- elegance by virtue of being fashionable
= synonyms: chic
verb
- display proudly
= synonyms: flash, flaunt, show off, ostentate
